PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Access Token for the authenticated user
The name of the variable to delete
Applicable if you are deleting a value within a list/array variable, the acceptable values for this parameter are 'index' and 'key'

Applicable if you are deleting a value within a list/array variable, if you are deleting by 'index' then enter the index number (starting from 0), if you are deleting by 'key' then enter the key value
If you are deleting within a list/array, the results will return the value of the variable. If you would like to include the metadata then set this parameter to True or 1
